content.name: hostLUN
content.description: Information about the LUNs and LUN snapshots to which a host has access.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the hostLUN instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the hostLUN instance.

attributes.name: host
attributes.description: Information about the host that has access to the LUN or LUN snapshot, as defined by the host resource type.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Indicates whether this instance of the hostLUN resource type represents a LUN or LUN snapshot.

attributes.name: hlu
attributes.description: Host LUN Identifier (HLU) for the host storage group.

attributes.name: lun
attributes.description: (Applies to LUNs only.) LUN, as defined by the lun resource type.

attributes.name: snap
attributes.description: (Applies to LUN snapshots only.) LUN snapshot, as defined by the lunSnap resource type.

attributes.name: isReadOnly
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the host access to the LUN or LUN snapshot is read-only. Values are:
  • true - Host access is read-only.
  • false - Host access is read-write.
